name: Music Boy 3D
description: Music Boy 3D is a rhythm-based 3D runner game with the unique webcam head-tracking technology. This game is distinguished by the accuracy and interactivity of the sound.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 2,5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1, 512 MB Storage: 512 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
